grudges.reason: Parked too close to me in the parking lot
Did not brew another pot of coffee after drinking the last cup
Failed to wish me a happy birthday but ate my cake
Generally obnoxious and unrepentant about that fact
Cut me in line at Safeway and then made eye contact
Ate the last slice of pizza and left the box out
Talked over me when I was telling a story
Changed my playlist as soon as I left the room for 30 seconds
Spoiled the plot line for Avengers: Endgame
Ate all of the vegan ham leftovers despite being labelled
